LanguageData.RWP_RepairThreshold_Label: [维修] 维修临界值（百分比）: {0}%
LanguageData.RWP_RepairThreshold_Desc: 设定居民开始维修损坏物品的耐久度临界值。居民不会维修耐久度在这个百分比之上的物品。
LanguageData.RWP_PrioritizeRottable_Label: [搬运工] 优先搬运易腐烂的物品
LanguageData.RWP_PrioritizeRottable_Desc: 搬运工会优先搬运易腐烂的物品（如玉米，食物，等等）然后是一般物品。
LanguageData.RWP_PrioritizeDeteriorating_Label: [搬运工] 优先搬运易老化的物品
LanguageData.RWP_PrioritizeDeteriorating_Desc: 搬运工会优先搬运易老化的物品（如武器，木头，等等）然后是一般物品。
LanguageData.RWP_DeterioratableMinHealthPercent_Label: If "Prioritise hauling deterioratables" is enabled, skip items if their current health falls below this percentage.
LanguageData.Designator_ForcedRepairDesc: Instruct colonists to repair the designated buildings even if their HP is above the assigned Repair Threshold.
